channel.title: Video Editing on AI Freedom Stack
channel.description: Recent content in Video Editing on AI Freedom Stack

item.title: Descript
item.description:
What is Descript?

A video and audio editor where editing happens through a text transcript. Record or import media, Descript transcribes it, and you edit the text to edit the video. Delete words, rearrange paragraphs, remove filler words — the video follows. Also includes screen recording, AI eye contact correction, and studio-quality audio enhancement.

Who is it for?

  • Best for: Podcasters, talking-head YouTubers, anyone who repurposes video into written content
  • Not for: Cinematic video editors, B-roll heavy content, music production
  • Solo builder score: ⭐⭐⭐⭐☆ (4/5)

What does it cost?

Plan Price What You Get
Free $0 1 hr transcription, basic features, watermark
Hobbyist $24/mo 10 hrs transcription, no watermark
Business $33/mo 30 hrs, all AI features

Hidden costs: Transcription hours are the real currency. Heavy creators will burn through Hobbyist fast.

item.title: Runway ML
item.description:
What is Runway ML?

An AI creative platform focused on video. Gen-3 Alpha is their flagship model — text-to-video and image-to-video that actually looks good. Also includes AI-powered video editing tools: background removal, motion tracking, inpainting, and more.

Who is it for?

  • Best for: Content creators, YouTubers, marketers who need short AI video clips
  • Not for: Anyone needing long-form video (too expensive) or real-time editing
  • Solo builder score: ⭐⭐⭐⭐☆ (4/5)

What does it cost?

Plan Price What You Get
Free $0 125 credits (~25s of Gen-3 video)
Standard $12/mo 625 credits/mo
Pro $28/mo 2,250 credits/mo + higher resolution
Unlimited $76/mo Unlimited Gen-3 generations

Hidden costs: Credits burn fast. A 5-second Gen-3 clip costs 25 credits. One minute of video = $12+ on Standard.
